title: [原版CB问答] 将实体朝向坐标转化为另一个实体的Motion
author: TheSuncommand
txt_content:
本帖最后由 TheSuncommand 于 2019-10-2 10:59 编辑 

如题,我制作了一个盔甲架,想让它攻击附近的怪物,它会自动转向附近的实体,然后通过计分板发射弓箭
但是我就卡在了怎么转化Motion这里

replies.author: SPGoding
replies.txt_content:
为什么 1.14 能被玩得那么麻烦？


forceload add -1 -1 1 1

execute as 盔甲架 at @s positioned 0.0 0.0 0.0 run summon minecraft:area_effect_cloud ^ ^ ^0.5 {Tags: ["marker"]}
data modify entity 生成的箭 Motion set from entity @e[type=minecraft:area_effect_cloud,tag=marker,limit=1] Pos
kill @e[type=minecraft:area_effect_cloud,tag=marker]

replies.author: 雪颜の顾
replies.txt_content:
什么版本？1.14.4的话首先给盔甲架1facing附近最近怪物
然后在盔甲架1 ^ ^ ^1召唤箭矢
然后store存储盔甲架1的xyz到计分板
在盔甲架1 ^ ^ ^-10再召唤一个盔甲架2，存储盔甲架2的xyz到计分板
然后scoreboard指令将盔甲架1的xyz减去盔甲架2的xyz
将得出的xyz乘0.1的倍率写入箭矢的Motion
最后清除盔甲架2

 ...

先创建计分板MotionX,MotionY,MotionZ
存盔甲架1坐标
execute as 盔甲架1 store result score @s MotionX run data get entity @s Pos[0]
execute as 盔甲架1 store result score @s MotionY run data get entity @s Pos[1]
execute as 盔甲架1 store result score @s MotionZ run data get entity @s Pos[2]
存盔甲架2坐标
execute as 盔甲架2 store result score @s MotionX run data get entity @s Pos[0]
execute as 盔甲架2 store result score @s MotionY run data get entity @s Pos[1]
execute as 盔甲架2 store result score @s MotionZ run data get entity @s Pos[2]
盔甲架1坐标减盔甲架2坐标
scoreboard players operation 盔甲架1 MotionX -= 盔甲架2 MotionX
scoreboard players operation 盔甲架1 MotionY -= 盔甲架2 MotionY
scoreboard players operation 盔甲架1 MotionZ -= 盔甲架2 MotionZ
将得出的坐标乘0.1倍率写入箭矢
execute as @e[type=arrow,distance=..1] at @s store result entity @s Motion[0] double 0.1 run scoreboard players get 盔甲架1 MotionX
execute as @e[type=arrow,distance=..1] at @s store result entity @s Motion[1] double 0.1 run scoreboard players get 盔甲架1 MotionY
execute as @e[type=arrow,distance=..1] at @s store result entity @s Motion[2] double 0.1 run scoreboard players get 盔甲架1 MotionZ
kill盔甲架2
